oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - American Ace - 1945-10-06 - WSM - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of excerpts from an American Ace sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment (6:45 pm) from October 6, 1945. Featuring Ralph Christian (host/announcer), and performers Minnie Pearl and Paul Howard and his Arkansas Cotton Pickers on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Paul Howard and his Arkansas Cotton Pickers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Minnie Pearl talks -- Ralph Christian talks -- Ralph Christian introduces Minnie Pearl and Paul Howard and his Arkansas Cotton Pickers -- American Ace Coffee commercial (Ralph Christian) -- Minnie Pearl talks -- Minnie Pearl introduces Paul Howard and his Arkansas Cotton Pickers -- Hang Your Head In Shame (Paul Howard and his Arkansas Cotton Pickers) -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- American Ace Coffee commercial (Minnie Pearl) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Grand ole opry (Radio program); Christian, Ralph; Minnie Pearl; Cannon, Sarah Ophelia, 1912-1996; Howard, Paul, 1908-1984; Arkansas Cotton Pickers;
